memberdef.argsstring: (const char *str, const char *str2, size_t kez, size_t veg)
memberdef.name: eggyezik

detaileddescription.para: Checks if a substring of str matches str2 within the specified range.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the string to be checked
pointer to the string to compare against
starting index of the substring to compare
ending index of the substring to compare (exclusive)

simplesect.para: true if the substring matches, false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (char *modules_coms, lista< size_t > &vegk, lista< size_t > &kezk, size_t &m_db, size_t &be_db, size_t &ki_db)
memberdef.name: muvcount

detaileddescription.para: Calculates various counts and values based on the input string.

parameterdescription.para: the character array containing module command
the list of the starter indexes
the list of the end indexes
the calculated number of modules based on characters in modules_coms
the calculated number of inputs based on characters in modules_coms
the calculated number of outputs based on characters in modules_coms
the calculated number of wires based on characters in modules_coms
